title: Should the latest Charlie Hebdo cartoons be published?
teaser: This week the cover of French satirical magazine will show a cartoon depicting the Prophet Muhammad holding a "Je Suis Charlie" sign.  Some newspapers and media groups have already published it. Most have not, including the BBC.  Is it more important now than ever to stand up for free speech and show the latest cartoons or not?
